ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OAD480]: Maintenance ING Grids - Selection criterias')

Text.val: -- At least one field must be entered

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1 where :2 for fetch only

select GRID_ID, GRID_NAME, GRID_ADDRESS, GRID_ZIP, GRID_CITY, GRID_COUNTRY, GRID_RISKRATING, GRID_LOCALCUSTOMERID, GRID_CUSTOMERTYPE, GRID_INDUSTRYCODE, GRID_SEGMENTATION, GRID_NATIONALREGISTRATIONNR, GRID_REVDATECDD, GRID_BANKRATINGDATE, GRID_RISKLEVEL from :1 where :2 for fetch only

select GRID_ID, GRID_NAME, GRID_ADDRESS, GRID_ZIP, GRID_CITY, GRID_COUNTRY, GRID_RISKRATING, GRID_LOCALCUSTOMERID, GRID_CUSTOMERTYPE, GRID_INDUSTRYCODE, GRID_SEGMENTATION, GRID_NATIONALREGISTRATIONNR, GRID_REVDATECDD, GRID_BANKRATINGDATE, GRID_RISKLEVEL from :1/GRID where :2 order by GRID_ID for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OAD480]: Maintenance ING Grids - Search results')

Text.val: -- retrurn to screen from which the detail screen was called, if key "Esc" is
-- Disabled key to prevent re-initialization of screen variables (avoid loosing already entered data)
-- Disabled key to prevent re-initialization of screen variables (avoid loosing already entered data)
-- Disabled previous row event (triggered via mouse wheel) to prevent re-initialization of screen variables
-- Disabled next row event (triggered via mouse wheel) to prevent re-initialization of screen variables

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OAD480]: Maintenance ING Grids - Detail screen')
VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,14}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,17}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,18}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,19}'VAR)

Text.val: -- only in case if new GRID row
-- GRID_ID already exists (only if a new GRID is entered)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select GRID_ID, GRID_NAME, GRID_ADDRESS, GRID_ZIP, GRID_CITY, GRID_COUNTRY, GRID_RISKRATING, GRID_ADMNO, GRID_CLNTNO, GRID_LOCALCUSTOMERID, GRID_CUSTOMERTYPE, GRID_INDUSTRYCODE, GRID_SEGMENTATION, GRID_NATIONALREGISTRATIONNR, GRID_REVDATECDD, GRID_BANKRATINGDATE, GRID_RISKLEVEL from :1/GRID where :2 order by GRID_ID for fetch only

select count(*) from ( select CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID from :1/CLNT where CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID = ':2' union select CDEP_ING_GRID_ID from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ING_GRID_ID = ':2' and CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTDEPO <> 0 union select CSEC_ING_GRID_ID from :1/CSEC where CSEC_ING_GRID_ID = ':2' union select GRCJ_GRID_ID from :1/GRCJ where GRCJ_GRID_ID = ':2') as R

select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT where CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID = ':2' union select CDEP_ADMNO, CDEP_CLNTNO from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ING_GRID_ID = ':2' and CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTDEPO <> 0 union select CSEC_ADMNO, CSEC_CLNTNO from :1/CSEC where CSEC_ING_GRID_ID = ':2' union select GRCJ_ADMNO, GRCJ_CLNTNO from :1/GRCJ where GRCJ_GRID_ID = ':2'
select DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DATDELETED is null and exists(select * from :1/DHIC where DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'G' and DHIC_ID = ':2' and DHIC_DEBH = DEBC_DEBH)
